ApexEmailNotification.name: ApexEmailNotification
ApexEmailNotification.description: Stores a Salesforce user ID or external email address to be notified when unhandled Apex exceptions occur.

Email.description: The external email address to which the notification is sent. Mutually exclusive with the UserId field.

UserId.description: ID of the user to which the notification is sent. Mutually exclusive with the Email field.
